titles.title: I Love to be a Viking

properties.tune: Vietnam Song by Country Joe And The Fish

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Well, come on Viking, don't be lax put on your tunic and grab your ax We're goin' down to our dragon ships gonna skewer some Saxons on our spear-tips We know we won't all be comin' back, but it's so fun to slash and hack!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And it's 1-2-3, who are fightin' for? I know, it don't matter at all, next stop is Odin's hall! And it's 5-6-7, headin' for the rainbow bridge, well, we love to fight, and that's no lie, whoopee, we're all gonna die!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Well we know dyin' ain't so tough, that's what makes us so mean and rough We know that when we kick off we'll be drinkin' good beer right out of a trough And grabbin' Valkyries by their bums and the hangover never comes!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So, you grab Oly and I'll get Sven the spring is here, it's time to raid again Let's steal the cattle and burn the huts and toss the women right on their butt's! And we'll have a good time and maybe we'll croak, but who cares, let's go make some smoke!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Well, Vikings are bad boys to the core even our poems are full of gore We like squishing intestines with our feet we think slaughter is really neat! Because fightin' and killin' pleases our gods, so hey, you can't beat the odds!
